(Video by Press Association)More than 60 million coronavirus vaccine doses have now been administered in the UK, Matt Hancock says.
It comes after 762,361 first and second jabs were delivered in tot… [+5006 chars]

articles.author: Chanel Georgina
articles.title: Statins side effects: The one sensation you should not ignore – you may need a lower dose - Express
articles.description: WHILE headaches, digestive issues and dizziness are common complaints when taking statins there's one more serious side effect that warrants a doctor's appointment.
